This game is a great example of the benefits that teamwork can bring you, all though it is hard to find good teammates in regular comp, once you have a good team you can achieve anything. The hardest part about the ranking system in this game is getting out of silver. the player at that rank are just really toxic and most dont care. sometimes you might fall across a player who is trying to do as you, and you guys q up and rank up together. a great game to make online friends. a classic game.
